name: Cat Dating Simulator
description:
Welcome to Cat Dating Simulator, the game created by a team of 2 in a couple of days.  The game that nobody asked for - but you're getting it anyway.

There is also an easter egg after you get a certain number of matches, so don't stop playing too quickly!

We will be developing more games in the future, this one was more of a learning process than anything.  If you'd like to support further development of new games please feel free to leave a donation - any amount helps!
